name: MARITAL
levels:
1 = married, 
2 = divorced, 
3 = widowed, 
4 = separated, 
5 = never married, 
6 = a member of an unmarried couple, 
9 = refused

name: EDUCA
prompt: What is the highest grade or year of school you completed?
levels:
1 = Never attended school or only kindergarten, 
2 = Grades 1 through 8 (Elementary), 
3 = Grades 9 through 11 (Some high school), 
4 = Grade 12 or GED (High school graduate), 
5 = College 1 year to 3 years (Some college or technical school), 
6 = College 4 years or more (College graduate), 
9 = refused

name: college_or_more
levels:
1 = college or more,
0 = high school or less

name: RENTHOM1
prompt: Do you own or rent your home?
levels:
1 = own, 
2 = rent, 
3 = other arrangement, 
7 = don't know/not sure, 
9 = refused

name: VETERAN3
prompt: Have you ever served on active duty in the United States Armed Forces, either in the regular military or in a National Guard or military reserve unit?
levels:
1 = yes, 
2 = no, 
7 = don't know/not sure, 
9 = refused

name: EMPLOY1
levels:
1 = employed for wages, 
2 = self-employed, 
3 = out of work for 1 year or more, 
4 = out of work for less than 1 year, 
5 = a homemaker, 
6 = a student, 
7 = retired, 
8 = unable to work, 
9 = refused

name: CHILDREN
prompt: How many children less than 18 years of age live in your household?

name: INCOME3
prompt: Is your annual household income from all sources...?

name: PREGNANT
prompt: To your knowledge, are you now pregnant?
levels:
1 = yes, 
2 = no, 
7 = don't know/not sure, 
9 = refused

name: DEAF
prompt: Are you deaf or do you have serious difficulty hearing?
levels:
1 = yes, 
2 = no, 
7 = don't know/not sure, 
9 = refused
